original_text:
“I will remove the northerner far from you,
    and drive him into a parched and desolate land,
his vanguard into the eastern sea,
    and his rear guard into the western sea;
the stench and foul smell of him will rise,
    for he has done great things.
korean_text: 내가 북쪽 군대를 너희에게서 멀리 떠나게 하여 메마르고 적막한 땅으로 쫓아내리니 그 앞의 부대는 동해로, 그 뒤의 부대는 서해로 들어갈 것이라 상한 냄새가 일어나고 악취가 오르리니 이는 큰 일을 행하였음이니라 하4)시리라

sentences.original_text: I will remove the northerner far from you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 북방 사람을 너희에게서 멀리 제거하리라

sentences.original_text: and drive him into a parched and desolate land
his vanguard into the eastern sea
and his rear guard into the western sea
the stench and foul smell of him will rise
for he has done great things.
